## ISharedCopyStaticAssetsConfiguration interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ISharedCopyStaticAssetsConfiguration 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [excludeGlobs](./heft.isharedcopystaticassetsconfiguration.excludeglobs.md) | string\[\] | Globs that should be explicitly excluded. This takes precedence over globs listed in "includeGlobs" and files that match the file extensions provided in "fileExtensions". |
|  [fileExtensions](./heft.isharedcopystaticassetsconfiguration.fileextensions.md) | string\[\] | File extensions that should be copied from the src folder to the destination folder(s) |
|  [includeGlobs](./heft.isharedcopystaticassetsconfiguration.includeglobs.md) | string\[\] | Globs that should be explicitly included. |
